meanings.definition: A person who performs in comedy shows or acts as a source of amusement.
meanings.sent1: The comedians made everyone laugh with their jokes.
meanings.sent2: We went to see a group of comedians perform at the comedy club.
meanings.sent3: The comedians had the audience in stitches with their hilarious skits.
meanings.sent4: The comedians' humor was like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The comedians' performances were so entertaining that we couldn't stop smiling.
